mapper.select: select ${querytype} AS data,adddate AS date,addtime AS time from info_table where(adddate = '${stdate}' and addtime > '${sttime}') union select ${querytype},adddate,addtime from info_table where adddate between '${stdatenxt}' and '${enddatepre}' union select ${querytype},adddate,addtime from info_table where(adddate = '${enddate}' and '${edtime}' > addtime ) order by adddate,addtime
select ${querytype} AS data,adddate AS date,addtime AS time from info_table where adddate = '${date}' and addtime between '${sttime}' and '${endtime}'
